name: CL_LNK_ORDER_IDS
description: The CL_LNK_ORDER_IDS table contains the overtime related information about the linked group.

columns.name: LNK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the linked order group.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the order records in this linked order group record.

columns.name: OFFSET
columns.description: This item stores the offset interval (in seconds) between linked orders in this group.

columns.name: ANCHOR_ORD_ID
columns.description: The order whose schedule this order is anchored to

columns.name: ANCHOR_DUE_TIME
columns.description: Which due time of the anchor order is this order anchored to?  If blank, but LNK-70 is set, then this order occurs with every instance of the anchor order.
